ygData.subject: combos I have tried for 'scuba gear'
ygData.msgSnippet: These are failures... 1 Fastener 1 Fish Scale 1 Rod 1 Bolts 1 Gear ... 1 Fastener 1 fish scale 1 Shaft 1 bolts 1 sprocket ... 1 Fastener 1 fish scale 1 Rod 1
ygData.messageBody:
These are failures...

1 Fastener
1 Fish Scale
1 Rod
1 Bolts
1 Gear

-------------

-------------

1 Fish scale
1 shaft

The series here is a combo of 5 with a fish scale,a fastener and 3 other components.
Help me finish this series out by trying some of the other components at the mills and letting folks here know
what you have failed on. I have reason to believe this is close to the 'scuba gear' recipe

Cheers,

"FizzWizz" of tunare
